 2017-03272017-04-12,  ,  ISED,  , 
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Small Business and Tourism of DRAGAN MATOVIC of Niagara Falls, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
